```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
# empty data frame with default names
data.frame(matrix(nrow = 10, ncol = 4))

# empty data frame with assigned names
data.frame(matrix(nrow = 10, ncol = 4)) %>% setNames(., c("dv", "N1", "MN1", "SD1"))  
```
